hooks.command: file_path=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.files[0].file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.zig$'; then if command -v zlint >/dev/null 2>&1; then zlint "$file_path" 2>&1 || true; fi; fi

file_path=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.files[0].file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.zig$'; then zig fmt "$file_path" 2>&1 || true; fi

file_path=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.files[0].file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|mjs|mts)$'; then project_dir=$(dirname "$file_path"); while [ "$project_dir" != "/" ]; do if [ -f "$project_dir/bunfig.toml" ] || [ -f "$project_dir/bun.lock" ] || [ -f "$project_dir/bun.lockb" ]; then if command -v biome >/dev/null 2>&1; then biome check --write "$file_path" 2>&1 || true; elif bunx biome --version >/dev/null 2>&1; then bunx biome check --write "$file_path" 2>&1 || true; fi; break; fi; project_dir=$(dirname "$project_dir"); done; fi
if [ -f bunfig.toml ] || [ -f bun.lock ] || [ -f bun.lockb ]; then bun test --bail 2>/dev/null || echo 'Tests completed with failures'; fi
